abstract: After being largely a sideshow at the debates, Herman Cain is now tied with Mitt Romney in the polls as he enters Tuesday’s debate, where he will face new scrutiny from his opponents.
snippet: After being largely a sideshow at the debates, Herman Cain is now tied with Mitt Romney in the polls as he enters Tuesday’s debate, where he will face new scrutiny from his opponents.

headline.main: Cain's Turn in the Hot Seat
